title: When the Lord of love returning

verses.text:
When the Lord of love returning,
Comes to claim his waiting bride,
All the lamps of hope are burning,
All the doors are opened wide;
All the promises are golden,
All the comforts multiply,
All the springs of joy beholden,
All the streams of bliss run high.

When the Lord of love returning,
Comes to bless his people dear,
All the altars shall be burning,
All the offerings shall appear;
All the prayers we have been making,
All the tears we have been shedding,
All the vows we have been taking,
All the hopes we have been wedding.

When the Lord of love returning,
Comes to take his children home,
All the lamps of love are burning,
All the hearts with joy o'ercome;
All the songs of earth are swelling,
All the heavenly choirs unite,
All the glory past all telling,
All the joy and all the light.
